description:
Long trail days call for trail shoes that back up your ambitions. Mesh lining and fatigue-fighting cushioning blunt the rocks and nobbly roots along your route, giving you more energy to push to summits and viewpoints. The GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry on wet and muddy trails.

  • Breathable mesh upper is lightweight with TPU overlays to add durability in high-wear areas
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape
  • Cleansport NXT™ treated for natural odour control
  • 100% recycled webbing, footbed cover, lining and laces
  • FloatPro® Foam midsole provides plenty of cushion and a rock plate protects against penetration
  • Vibram TC5+ outsole with 5mm lugs provides durable traction
name: Merrell Siren 4 Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Women's
